name: AzureDevOps-Plugin
description: TODO: Give a short introduction of your project. Let this section explain the objectives or the motivation behind this project.

scripts.build: npm run-script replace && npm run-script compileTypeScript
scripts.package: npm run-script build && $(npm bin)/tfx extension create --output-path ./deployment/
scripts.test-publish: npm run-script build && $(npm bin)/tfx extension publish --share-with cqse --rev-version --output-path deployment --token $(node scripts/cat.js token)
